game.title: Anagram Hunt
game.instruction: Find all words made from the letters of "{word}"
game.noHistoryYet: No completed levels yet. Start playing to see your history!

splash.title: Anagram Hunt
splash.rule1: You'll get a seed word and 5 minutes on the clock.
splash.rule2: Find as many words as you can using only the letters from the seed word.
splash.rule3: Look for bonuses to get extra points!

bonus.streakDescription: Get a 50pt bonus for each word of the same length found in a row. The bonus is multiplied by the streak length (e.g., a 3-word streak gives a 100pt bonus).
bonus.straightDescription: Get a 100pt bonus for finding words of sequentially increasing length. The bonus is multiplied by the straight length (e.g., a 3-word straight gives a 200pt bonus).

devTools.title: Word List Generator
devTools.description: Enter a seed word to find all possible sub-words. The generated JSON will have the correct format for a level file.
